name: unadoptable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If an animal or child is unadoptable, there is some reason why they cannot be adopted (= permanently taken into someone's home as part of their family): Many of the dogs have behavioural problems that make them unadoptable. Very young children are rarely found to be unadoptable. Related word
adopt
More examplesFewer examplesThe trainers work with dogs that have been abused and are considered unadoptable.Most of the animals that come to the shelter are unadoptable.The social workers judged that the girls were unadoptable and placed them in a care home.
